title: integrated firewalls
extract: The integrated user firewall feature introduces an authentication source via integration with Microsoft Active Directory technology. Provides visibility into who is accessing the SRX Series and best-effort security for access to the SRX Series. A single-box solution, requiring only an SRX Series.
extract_html: The integrated user firewall feature introduces an authentication source via integration with Microsoft Active Directory technology. Provides visibility into who is accessing the SRX Series and best-effort security for access to the SRX Series. A single-box solution, requiring only an SRX Series.
